author: Rory Sullivan, Rory Sullivan
title: Coronavirus: Face masks should be compulsory on public transport, says Sadiq Khan
description: Sadiq Khan says there is 'evidence' they are effective in reducing spread of virus
content:
The mayor of London has said that masks should be made compulsory on public transport, citing evidence that suggests face coverings reduce the spread of coronavirus. 
Sadiq Khan said this measure would be an additional protection on top of social distancing,… [+2559 chars]
